divs: Sighting Details we heard a rumor about someone seeing lights in akind of remote area not to far from us so my cousin and i rode up to the sitewhere the lights were seen and as soon as we arrived we saw a couple of brightlights that were bouncing around in the sky and would stop and go back and thencontinue forward then get to a certain point and then disappear - it looks likewe are seen sitting there watching them and then it will go out - and one nightwe saw an object fly over us in the shape of a triangle with alot of roundlights on the bottom - sounds kind of weird and maybe nothing to investigate butit happens on a nightly basis when the night is clear
trends: There has been one other sighting in buckingham
There were no other sightings in buckingham on or around April 28th 2002
